channel.title: Need help with eclipse [SKYPE/TEAMVIEWER I HAVE]
channel.description:
Hey there guys, I've just got a little problem and I've been told it's for using eclipse, I've followed tut's on eclipse but I can't seem to get it...
Here's my compiler's error: [code]src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \187 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \191 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And I followed a tut, the client side worked perfectly, but then when I tried with the server, I got this error on server (Whilst trying to run via eclipse): [code]Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.Launcher Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And this error whilst trying to do the Run As section: [code]<terminated> Launcher [Java Application] C:\Program Files\Java\Jre7\bin\javaw.exe USE: guimode(boolean) debug(boolean) hosted(boolean)[/code]
The above Console message, this is an image to say what I see. [img]http://gyazo.com/89b2db8c78448a106b1f8efa9bce994f.png[/img]
Also, this is my Run.bat: [code]@echo off @title Run BlazeScape java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmx815m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code]
If you could help me at all, reply on forums or add me on skype: Skype Name: Haydnz1234
Thanks for reading guys.

item.title: Need help with eclipse [SKYPE/TEAMVIEWER I HAVE]
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Go to Run Configurations and find “program arguments”. In there, write “true true false” (without the speech marks) and apply the changes. Then try to run it again.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with eclipse [SKYPE/TEAMVIEWER I HAVE]

item.title: Need help with eclipse [SKYPE/TEAMVIEWER I HAVE]
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

Hey there guys,
I’ve just got a little problem and I’ve been told it’s for using eclipse, I’ve followed tut’s on eclipse but I can’t seem to get it…

Here’s my compiler’s error:

src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \187 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \191 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

And I followed a tut, the client side worked perfectly, but then when I tried with the server, I got this error on server (Whilst trying to run via eclipse):

Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.Launcher Press any key to continue . . .

And this error whilst trying to do the Run As section:

<terminated> Launcher [Java Application] C:\Program Files\Java\Jre7\bin\javaw.exe USE: guimode(boolean) debug(boolean) hosted(boolean)

The above Console message, this is an image to say what I see.

Also, this is my Run.bat:

@echo off @title Run BlazeScape java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmx815m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

If you could help me at all, reply on forums or add me on skype:
Skype Name: Haydnz1234

Thanks for reading guys.
